t: Bildad: How Can Man Be Righteous?
Then*p Bildad the Shuhite answered and said:
“Dominion*pn and fear belong*i to Him; He*ld makes peace in His high places.
Is*ld there any number to His armies? Upon*ld whom does His light not rise?
How*ld then can man be righteous before God? Or*ld how can he be pure who*i is*i born of a woman?
If*ld even the moon does not shine, And*ld the stars are not pure in His sight,
How*ld much less man, who*i is*i a maggot, And*ld a son of man, who*i is*i a worm?”
